example.code:
PS C:\> Update-C9EnvironmentMembership -UserArn arn:aws:iam::123456789012:user/AnotherDemoUser -EnvironmentId ffd88420d4824eeeaeaa8a04bfde8cEX -Permission read-only
EnvironmentId : ffd88420d4824eeeaeaa8a04bfde8cEX LastAccess : 1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM Permissions : read-only UserArn : arn:aws:iam::123456789012:user/AnotherDemoUser UserId : AIDAJ3BA6O2FMJWCWXHEX
example.description: This example changes the settings of the specified existing environment member for the specified AWS Cloud9 development environment.
